replies.body:
Cant wait to get supported by all the new Sona "mains"

At least ill be able to die to sick beats.

Would you believe they mained her if they played another skin though. All skins can be kinda deceptive, and the amount of both good and bad Pulsefires and Spiritguards I've seen lead me to believe that it doesn't really matter what skin they have. I actually kinda main Sona however I can definitely see what you mean though.
gotta skin it, to win it
Don't worry, the hype will die down after a while and you'll have actual Sona mains supporting you

Hey Guys,
I have fixed the DJ Sona skin release.
I am looking into how this happened but in short the store settings were setup correctly and got modified overnight, hence the skin not showing up in the store.

I apologize for the delay.

-ToxicHawk
nvm I take it back its fixed

Don't say "Available Now"  when it isn't available now.

I got excited by the video, ran to the game client, purchased RP and..............

Still waiting.

Edit: Note that this isn't really a complaint.  I'm just incredibly excited to see this skin in action.
I know I was like yes and she is even in the store but you cant buy her wtf
why isn't dj{{champion:37}} released yet you said it was here you broke my {{item:3110}}
I feel lied to maaan it's 3:21 AM and it's so not out right now :(
I wish Rito had commissioned Daft Punk to do the music XD
PLEASE Make it when she heals Azir there is a Darude - "Sandstorm" reference or Something!!!! Please Rito
logged in just to upvote!! DARUDE SANDSTORM

"I hate electronic music!" - Before DJ Sona release.
"Electronic music is amazing!" - After DJ Sona release.

Those people who hate on electronic without even listening to it >.>

Just like "I hate Yasuo players such noobs with noob champ" - Before Project Yasuo release
"OMG Yasuo best champ ever! ofc only i can play yas properly and betterly than anyone else." After Project Yasuo release.

i hate when ultimate skins comes out and there is a big hype over that champ and all the real sona mains get drowned out by all the people that only play her for the skin but meh, im happy with my arcade sona <3
swiggity swoogity OCE is coming for that booty
